summary: A pytest test suite that validates various utility components of the movie editing library, covering configuration handling, cross‑platform subprocess parameter generation, time conversion utilities, decorator argument consistency, deprecation handling, file extension discovery, subprocess call wrappers, and a simple file‑writing helper.
business_intent: To guarantee the correctness and stability of low‑level helper functions used throughout the video processing library, ensuring they behave consistently across operating systems, respect deprecated interfaces, and correctly manage file and subprocess operations, thereby preventing regressions and supporting reliable media processing workflows.
